description: Run `set hostname` with the metafield value from`hostname`.
script:
config system global
    set hostname "{{devmeta.hostname}}"
end

scriptName: Change the FortiManager Devicename using the API in a Custom Playbook

description: Script Template to create create VLANs on a Device DB using the metadata variables `site_subnet`, `vlan_count`, and `vlan_cidr`.
Create a lo0 without an IP assigned.
script:
config system interface
  edit "lo0"
    set type loopback
    set vdom "root"
    set allowaccess ping
    set description "Create lo0 for monitor test"
  next
end

description:
Build sample address objects using the following metadata values:
* `supernet` (Default=10.0.0.0/8)
* `cidr` (Default=32)
* `start_index` (Default=1)
* `network_count` (Default=4)

Then build a policy matrix that creates a policy for every `src` to every `dst`.

scriptName: Create lo1 using FMG CLI Script with a Variable
script:
config system interface
  edit lo1
    set vdom root
    set type loopback
    set ip 172.29.255.$(site_id)/32
  next
end

scriptName: Create lo2 using FMG Jinja Script with a Supernet

description: Create a Loopback0 `lo0` via the `Config DB`.
script:
config system interface
  edit "lo0"
    set type loopback
    set vdom "root"
    {%- if devmeta.loopback0_ip is defined and devmeta.loopback0_ip != '' %}
    set ip {{devmeta.loopback0_ip}}/32
    {%- endif %}
    set allowaccess ping
    set description "Create lo0 for monitor test"
  next
end

description:
Use the FMG API `/pm/config/device/{{record.devname}}/global/system/interface` to retrieve the FortiGate interfaces and put them into an attribute for jinja names `interfaces`. 

Iterate through these interfaces and show a table of interfaces.

Use the FMG API `/pm/config/device/{{record.devname}}/global/system/interface` to retrieve the FortiGate interfaces and put them into an attribute for jinja names `interfaces`. 

Iterate through these interfaces that are of type `physical` and show a table for reporting.
